# secret religion (SR) feature which first appeared in CKII v2.7.0.
#
# Generated by src/sr_codegen.py on: 2017-04-25
################################################################################


emf_sr_has_any_religion_char_flag = {
	OR = {
		has_character_flag = character_was_catholic
		has_character_flag = character_was_cathar
		has_character_flag = character_was_fraticelli
		has_character_flag = character_was_waldensian
		has_character_flag = character_was_lollard
		has_character_flag = character_was_adoptionist
		has_character_flag = character_was_arian
		has_character_flag = character_was_orthodox
		has_character_flag = character_was_bogomilist
		has_character_flag = character_was_monothelite
		has_character_flag = character_was_iconoclast
		has_character_flag = character_was_syriac
		has_character_flag = character_was_maronite
		has_character_flag = character_was_miaphysite
		has_character_flag = character_was_monophysite
		has_character_flag = character_was_apostolic
		has_character_flag = character_was_paulician
		has_character_flag = character_was_tondrakian
		has_character_flag = character_was_nestorian
		has_character_flag = character_was_messalian
		has_character_flag = character_was_sunni
		has_character_flag = character_was_zikri
		has_character_flag = character_was_mahdiyya
		has_character_flag = character_was_nabawiyya
		has_character_flag = character_was_ibadi
		has_character_flag = character_was_kharijite
		has_character_flag = character_was_haruri
		has_character_flag = character_was_shiite
		has_character_flag = character_was_waqifi
		has_character_flag = character_was_zaydi
		has_character_flag = character_was_hurufi
		has_character_flag = character_was_ismaili
		has_character_flag = character_was_druze
		has_character_flag = character_was_qarmatian
		has_character_flag = character_was_norse_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_norse_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_aztec_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_aztec
		has_character_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_east_african_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_east_african_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_zun_pagan_reformed
		has_character_flag = character_was_zun_pagan
		has_character_flag = character_was_zoroastrian
		has_character_flag = character_was_mazdaki
		has_character_flag = character_was_zurvanist
		has_character_flag = character_was_manichean
		has_character_flag = character_was_mandaean
		has_character_flag = character_was_yazidi
		has_character_flag = character_was_jewish
		has_character_flag = character_was_samaritan
		has_character_flag = character_was_karaite
		has_character_flag = character_was_hindu
		has_character_flag = character_was_buddhist
		has_character_flag = character_was_jain
	}
}

emf_sr_is_in_PREVs_interesting_society = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic
			PREV = { interested_in_society = secret_religious_society_catholic }
		}
		AND = {
			society_member_of = secret_religious_society_cathar

emf_sr_has_any_char_old_religion = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_catholic
			any_character = { religion = catholic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_cathar
			any_character = { religion = cathar }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_fraticelli
			any_character = { religion = fraticelli }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_waldensian
			any_character = { religion = waldensian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_lollard
			any_character = { religion = lollard }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_adoptionist
			any_character = { religion = adoptionist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_arian
			any_character = { religion = arian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_orthodox
			any_character = { religion = orthodox }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_bogomilist
			any_character = { religion = bogomilist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_monothelite
			any_character = { religion = monothelite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_iconoclast
			any_character = { religion = iconoclast }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_syriac
			any_character = { religion = syriac }
		}
		AND = {

		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_miaphysite

		}

			has_character_flag = character_was_apostolic

		}

		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_buddhist
			any_character = { religion = buddhist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_jain
			any_character = { religion = jain }
		}
	}
}

# THIS = province, ROOT is in a society which correspond to a secret religious community in THIS
emf_sr_has_secret_community_of_ROOT = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_cathar }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_fraticelli }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waldensian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_lollard }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_adoptionist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_arian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_orthodox }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bogomilist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monothelite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_iconoclast }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_syriac }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_maronite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_miaphysite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_miaphysite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monophysite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_apostolic_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_apostolic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_paulician_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_paulician }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_tondrakian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tondrakian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nestorian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_messalian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_messalian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_sunni_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zikri_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_mahdiyya_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_nabawiyya_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_ibadi_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_kharijite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_haruri_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_shiite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_waqifi_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zaydi_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zaydi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_hurufi_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hurufi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_ismaili_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ismaili }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_druze_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_druze }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_qarmatian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_qarmatian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_reformed_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_zurvanist_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_manichean_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_mandaean_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_yazidi_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_jewish_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_samaritan_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_karaite_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_hindu_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_buddhist_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_province_modifier = secret_jain_community
			ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain }
		}
	}
}

# THIS = county title, FROM's secret religious society is used
emf_sr_can_have_new_secret_community_of_FROM = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = catholic
					has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_cathar }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = cathar
					has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_fraticelli }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = fraticelli
					has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waldensian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = waldensian
					has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_lollard }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = lollard
					has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_adoptionist }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = adoptionist
					has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_arian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = arian
					has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_orthodox }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = orthodox
					has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bogomilist }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = bogomilist
					has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monothelite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = monothelite
					has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_iconoclast }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = iconoclast
					has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_syriac }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = syriac
					has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_maronite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = maronite
					has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_miaphysite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = miaphysite
					has_province_modifier = secret_miaphysite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monophysite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = monophysite
					has_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_apostolic }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = apostolic
					has_province_modifier = secret_apostolic_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_paulician }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = paulician
					has_province_modifier = secret_paulician_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tondrakian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = tondrakian
					has_province_modifier = secret_tondrakian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nestorian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = nestorian
					has_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_messalian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = messalian
					has_province_modifier = secret_messalian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = sunni
					has_province_modifier = secret_sunni_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zikri
					has_province_modifier = secret_zikri_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = mahdiyya
					has_province_modifier = secret_mahdiyya_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = nabawiyya
					has_province_modifier = secret_nabawiyya_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = ibadi
					has_province_modifier = secret_ibadi_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = kharijite
					has_province_modifier = secret_kharijite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = haruri
					has_province_modifier = secret_haruri_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = shiite
					has_province_modifier = secret_shiite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = waqifi
					has_province_modifier = secret_waqifi_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zaydi }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zaydi
					has_province_modifier = secret_zaydi_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hurufi }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = hurufi
					has_province_modifier = secret_hurufi_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ismaili }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = ismaili
					has_province_modifier = secret_ismaili_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_druze }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = druze
					has_province_modifier = secret_druze_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_qarmatian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = qarmatian
					has_province_modifier = secret_qarmatian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = norse_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = norse_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = tengri_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = baltic_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = finnish_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = aztec_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = aztec
					has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = slavic_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = west_african_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = east_african_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = east_african_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zun_pagan_reformed
					has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_reformed_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zun_pagan
					has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					has_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = mazdaki
					has_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = zurvanist
					has_province_modifier = secret_zurvanist_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = manichean
					has_province_modifier = secret_manichean_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = mandaean
					has_province_modifier = secret_mandaean_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = yazidi
					has_province_modifier = secret_yazidi_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = jewish
					has_province_modifier = secret_jewish_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = samaritan
					has_province_modifier = secret_samaritan_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = karaite
					has_province_modifier = secret_karaite_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = hindu
					has_province_modifier = secret_hindu_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = buddhist
					has_province_modifier = secret_buddhist_community
				}
			}
		}
		AND = {
			FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain }
			location = {
				NOR = {
					religion = jain
					has_province_modifier = secret_jain_community
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# THIS = province, ROOT's secret_religion is considered
emf_sr_has_not_religion_or_community_of_ROOT_sr = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = catholic }
			NOR = {
				religion = catholic
				has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = cathar }
			NOR = {
				religion = cathar
				has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = fraticelli }
			NOR = {
				religion = fraticelli
				has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = waldensian }
			NOR = {
				religion = waldensian
				has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = lollard }
			NOR = {
				religion = lollard
				has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = adoptionist }
			NOR = {
				religion = adoptionist
				has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = arian }
			NOR = {
				religion = arian
				has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = orthodox }
			NOR = {
				religion = orthodox
				has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = bogomilist }
			NOR = {
				religion = bogomilist
				has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = monothelite }
			NOR = {
				religion = monothelite
				has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = iconoclast }
			NOR = {
				religion = iconoclast
				has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = syriac }
			NOR = {
				religion = syriac
				has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = maronite }
			NOR = {
				religion = maronite
				has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = miaphysite }
			NOR = {
				religion = miaphysite
				has_province_modifier = secret_miaphysite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = monophysite }
			NOR = {
				religion = monophysite
				has_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = apostolic }
			NOR = {
				religion = apostolic
				has_province_modifier = secret_apostolic_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = paulician }
			NOR = {
				religion = paulician
				has_province_modifier = secret_paulician_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = tondrakian }
			NOR = {
				religion = tondrakian
				has_province_modifier = secret_tondrakian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = nestorian }
			NOR = {
				religion = nestorian
				has_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = messalian }
			NOR = {
				religion = messalian
				has_province_modifier = secret_messalian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = sunni }
			NOR = {
				religion = sunni
				has_province_modifier = secret_sunni_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zikri }
			NOR = {
				religion = zikri
				has_province_modifier = secret_zikri_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = mahdiyya }
			NOR = {
				religion = mahdiyya
				has_province_modifier = secret_mahdiyya_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = nabawiyya }
			NOR = {
				religion = nabawiyya
				has_province_modifier = secret_nabawiyya_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = ibadi }
			NOR = {
				religion = ibadi
				has_province_modifier = secret_ibadi_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = kharijite }
			NOR = {
				religion = kharijite
				has_province_modifier = secret_kharijite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = haruri }
			NOR = {
				religion = haruri
				has_province_modifier = secret_haruri_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = shiite }
			NOR = {
				religion = shiite
				has_province_modifier = secret_shiite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = waqifi }
			NOR = {
				religion = waqifi
				has_province_modifier = secret_waqifi_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zaydi }
			NOR = {
				religion = zaydi
				has_province_modifier = secret_zaydi_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = hurufi }
			NOR = {
				religion = hurufi
				has_province_modifier = secret_hurufi_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = ismaili }
			NOR = {
				religion = ismaili
				has_province_modifier = secret_ismaili_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = druze }
			NOR = {
				religion = druze
				has_province_modifier = secret_druze_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = qarmatian }
			NOR = {
				religion = qarmatian
				has_province_modifier = secret_qarmatian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = norse_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = norse_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = norse_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = tengri_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = tengri_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = baltic_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = baltic_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = finnish_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = finnish_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = aztec_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = aztec_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = aztec }
			NOR = {
				religion = aztec
				has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = slavic_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = slavic_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = west_african_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = west_african_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = east_african_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = east_african_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = east_african_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = east_african_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_east_african_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
			NOR = {
				religion = zun_pagan_reformed
				has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_reformed_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zun_pagan }
			NOR = {
				religion = zun_pagan
				has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zoroastrian }
			NOR = {
				religion = zoroastrian
				has_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = mazdaki }
			NOR = {
				religion = mazdaki
				has_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = zurvanist }
			NOR = {
				religion = zurvanist
				has_province_modifier = secret_zurvanist_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = manichean }
			NOR = {
				religion = manichean
				has_province_modifier = secret_manichean_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = mandaean }
			NOR = {
				religion = mandaean
				has_province_modifier = secret_mandaean_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = yazidi }
			NOR = {
				religion = yazidi
				has_province_modifier = secret_yazidi_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = jewish }
			NOR = {
				religion = jewish
				has_province_modifier = secret_jewish_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = samaritan }
			NOR = {
				religion = samaritan
				has_province_modifier = secret_samaritan_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = karaite }
			NOR = {
				religion = karaite
				has_province_modifier = secret_karaite_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = hindu }
			NOR = {
				religion = hindu
				has_province_modifier = secret_hindu_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = buddhist }
			NOR = {
				religion = buddhist
				has_province_modifier = secret_buddhist_community
			}
		}
		AND = {
			ROOT = { secret_religion = jain }
			NOR = {
				religion = jain
				has_province_modifier = secret_jain_community
			}
		}
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_african_pagan_group = {
	OR = {
		religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		religion = west_african_pagan
		religion = east_african_pagan_reformed
		religion = east_african_pagan
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_christian_group_1 = {
	OR = {
		religion = catholic
		religion = cathar
		religion = fraticelli
		religion = waldensian
		religion = lollard
		religion = nestorian
		religion = messalian
		religion = adoptionist
		religion = arian
		religion = maronite
		religion = syriac
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_christian_group_2 = {
	OR = {
		religion = orthodox
		religion = bogomilist
		religion = monothelite
		religion = iconoclast
		religion = paulician
		religion = miaphysite
		religion = monophysite
		religion = apostolic
		religion = tondrakian
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_muslim_group_1 = {
	OR = {
		religion = sunni
		religion = zikri
		religion = ibadi
		religion = kharijite
		religion = mahdiyya
		religion = nabawiyya
		religion = haruri
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_muslim_group_2 = {
	OR = {
		religion = shiite
		religion = druze
		religion = hurufi
		religion = waqifi
		religion = zaydi
		religion = ismaili
		religion = qarmatian
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_cult_need_RoI = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_cult_need_SoA = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_cult_need_SoI = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zaydi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hurufi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ismaili
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_druze
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_qarmatian
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_cult_need_TOG = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_east_african_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan
	}
}

emf_sr_old_religion_is_liege_sr = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_catholic
			liege = { secret_religion = catholic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_cathar
			liege = { secret_religion = cathar }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_fraticelli
			liege = { secret_religion = fraticelli }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_waldensian
			liege = { secret_religion = waldensian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_character_flag = character_was_lollard
			liege = { secret_religion = lollard }
		}

			liege = { secret_religion = adoptionist }
		}
